created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The time this credential was created.

last_used_at.title: Last Used At
last_used_at.description: The last time this credential was used.

rpid.title: Relying Party ID
rpid.description: The Relying Party ID used to register this credential.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username of the user this credential belongs to.

description.title: Description
description.description: The user description of this credential.

kid.title: Public Key ID
kid.description: The Public Key ID of this credential.

aaguid.title: AAGUID
aaguid.description: The Authenticator Attestation Global Unique Identifier of this credential.

attestation_type.title: Attestation Type
attestation_type.description: The attestation format type this credential uses.

attachment.title: Attachment
attachment.description: The last recorded credential attachment type.

sign_count.title: Sign Count
sign_count.description: The last recorded credential sign count.

clone_warning.title: Clone Warning
clone_warning.description: The clone warning status of the credential.

legacy.title: Legacy
legacy.description: The legacy value indicates this credential may need to be registered again.

discoverable.title: Discoverable
discoverable.description: The discoverable status of this credential.

present.title: Present
present.description: The user presence status of this credential.

verified.title: Verified
verified.description: The verified status of this credential.

backup_eligible.title: Backup Eligible
backup_eligible.description: The backup eligible status of this credential.

backup_state.title: Backup Eligible
backup_state.description: The backup eligible status of this credential.
